lead_paragraph: Eric Hosmer homered, Ian Kennedy took a shutout into the sixth inning, and the Kansas City Royals ended a long scoreless streak and a five-game skid with a 4-1 victory over the Seattle Mariners on Sunday.

headline.print_headline: Royals Snap Losing Streak With 4-1 Win Against Mariners
headline.main: Royals Snap Losing Streak With 4-1 Win Against Mariners

snippet: Eric Hosmer homered, Ian Kennedy took a shutout into the sixth inning, and the Kansas City Royals ended a long scoreless streak and a five-game skid with a 4-1 victory over the Seattle Mariners on Sunday....
